channel.title: How can i get life to monsters?
channel.description: Hi m8s! I`ve started Moparscape and its Great but my enemiese just keep dying when i`ve Attacking them..They got no Hp at All..Pleas try to explain or post pics or a movie or something like that. Thank you.

item.title: How can i get life to monsters?
item.dc:creator: @tasty_noob tasty noob
item.description:
@tasty_noob wrote:

Info may be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html
that is mod tahroks tutorial guide. That will teach you how to do most basic things.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i get life to monsters?
item.dc:creator: @tasty_noob tasty noob
item.description:
@tasty_noob wrote:

its cause you spawned them just before. I believe you are using mopar localhost. It is really nothing to do. I would recommend gettign a source and adding npcs through autospawn.cfg without using commands.

item.title: How can i get life to monsters?
item.dc:creator: @firedude076 firedude076
item.description:
@firedude076 wrote:

Go in ur npc.cfg and search for the monsters name then change it’s hp to w/e you want.
